amendment.description: To require the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain Federal land to the city of Mesquite, Nevada.

vote.text: Amendment SA 55 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 55 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S622-623; text: CR S622-623) To require the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain Federal land to the city of Mesquite, Nevada.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 55 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 55 proposed by Senator Reid.
